### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE participation_tracking ( 
    student_id INT, 
    discussion_participation INT, 
    quiz_score INT, 
    project_completion INT 
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE participation_tracking SET discussion_participation = 10, quiz_score = 90 WHERE student_id = 1

### TABLEDATA

    student_id INT,

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    class_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE participation (
    participation_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    discussion_participation INT,
    quiz_score INT,
    project_involvement INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (participation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE students SET student_name = 'Alice' WHERE student_id = 1;

);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE participation SET discussion_participation = 8 WHERE participation_id = 3;
